description.full: The Games on Demand version supports  English.  "It’s time for kick off! Team up with the coolest and craziest kids ever to play football. Choose from a variety of playing options – including a super-charged Story Mode, or kick into Multi-player Mode to play pick up games with * Multiple gameplay modes including story mode, pick up mode and tournament mode * Play with up to 4 friends at once * 12 all new fields * Explosive Power-Ups * Addicting Mini-Games"
description.short: "It’s time for kick off! Team up with the coolest and craziest kids ever to play football. Choose from a variety of playing options – including a super-charged Story Mode, or kick into Multi-player Mode to play pick up games with * Multiple gameplay modes including story mode, pick up mode and tournament mode * Play with up to 4 friends at once * 12 all new fields * Explosive Power-Ups * Addicting Mini-Games"
